history.proof: intros x a H. inversion H. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto q: on depth: 3. - hauto use: app_inj_tail.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set leA : A -> A -> Prop x : List a : A H : Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) H1 : Nil = x ++ Cons a Nil Unable to unify "Desc ?M1405 ?M1406 nil" with "Descl x".

In environment A : Set leA : A -> A -> Prop x : List a : A H : Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) x0 : A H1 : Cons x0 Nil = x ++ Cons a Nil Unable to unify "Desc ?M1405 ?M1406 ((?M1409 ++ ?M1408 :: nil) ++ ?M1407 :: nil)" with "Descl x".

In environment A : Set leA : A -> A -> Prop x : List a : A H : Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) x0 : A H1 : Cons x0 Nil = x ++ Cons a Nil Unable to unify "Desc ?M1405 ?M1406 ((?M1409 ++ ?M1408 :: nil) ++ ?M1407 :: nil)" with "Descl x".

In environment A : Set leA : A -> A -> Prop x : List a : A H : Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) x0 : A H1 : Cons x0 Nil = x ++ Cons a Nil Unable to unify "Ltl ?M1405 ?M1406 (?M1407 :: ?M1410) (?M1408 :: ?M1411)" with "Descl x".

original: intros x a H. inversion H. - apply d_nil. - inversion H3; subst. + apply d_conc; auto. + apply d_conc. * apply Lt_hd; auto. * apply IHl; auto.
